The PikaScript namespace.


Detailed Description

QuickVars is a (generally) faster version of the reference implementation's STLVariable.

It achieves its better performance by caching the most recently used variables in a super-tiny hash table. The downside is that it uses more stack memory, especially if you have deep calling stacks with few local variables.

Version:

Version 0.92
